text_logic_form: The line $NQ$ is the median of the shape $NPR$.
The line $VX$ is the median of the shape $VWY$.
The triangles $PNR$ and $WVY$ are similar to each other.
The length of the line $NQ$ is $8$.
The length of the line $PR$ is $12$.
The length of the line $WY$ is $7x-1$.
The length of the line $VX$ is $4x+2$.

diagram_logic_form: The point $Q$ lies on the line $RP$.
The point $X$ lies on the line $WY$.
line_instances: There are lines $NP$, $NQ$, $NR$, forming the triangle $NPR$.
There are lines $QP$, $QR$, $PR$, forming the triangle $PQR$.
There are lines $VX$, $VW$, $VY$, forming the triangle $VWY$.
There are lines $WX$, $XY$, $WY$, forming the triangle $WXY$.
